Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Figures/box

Function
  1. Figure box(FProperty props...)
  2. Figure box(Figure inner, FProperty props...)
Description Draw a rectangular box using the properties props. An optional nested figure inner may be placed inside the box.
Examples The fragment 
b1 = box(width(100), height(20), fillColor("red"));
render(b1);
will display:

We can nest b1 in another box b2 as follows: 
b1 = box(width(100), height(20), fillColor("red"));
b2 = box(b1, gap(10), fillColor("yellow"));
render(b2);
Note that:
  • A gap is defined for b2.
  • The dimensions of b2 are determined by the dimensions of the inner box and this gap.
The result is:
